name: Extreme Offroad Cars 3: Cargo
description:
In this cargo delivery game, you'll practice and improve your driving skills as you navigate through the rough terrain. It's up to you to pass each level and unlock all the trucks which you can use in any of the missions you already finished.

Test different cars on different levels and see what works best for you. What do you say?

If you enjoyed this game and want to play more similar games you can also try out the 18 Wheeler Cargo Simulator.
